name: Blooms Embroidered Red Tunic
description: Pair the Blooms Embroidered Red Tunic of well fitted pants and a big smile, it's a proven stunner. Made from rayon, it has embroidery detail on the cuffs, a v-neck & a hig-low hemline

name: Peacock Printed Raglan Tee
description: Get your style game up this season with the Peacock Printed Raglan Tee. Made from viscose, this tee has puff print detail with three-fourth flared raglan sleeves.

name: Stripes Off Shoulder Crop Top
description: Go from a desk to party in a jiffy with the Striped Off Shoulder Crop Top. Made from polyester, it has a printed bodice & flared sleeves with pompom lace trim.

name: El Paso Designs Unisex Classic Mexican Baja Pullover Hoodie
description: Warm, soft and comfortable outerwear, Durable and breathable with pockets and adjustable hood, Cozy, everyday leisure wear.

name: Hooded check flannel shirt Semi-tailored fit
description: Removable sweat hood for a trompe-l'oeil layered look, Semi-tailored fit, Flap pockets, Soft and light 100% cotton flannel
